about_the_game:
Welcome to the demo version of Wee Tanks, a fast-paced tank combat game where you'll experience intense battles, creative map building, and challenging survival mode gameplay.

In the classic campaign, you'll have access to 100 exciting missions that will put your tank combat skills to the test. Each level has its own unique challenges and enemies to defeat, including epic boss battles that will require all of your firepower and strategic thinking to overcome.

But that's not all! With our map editor, you can unleash your creativity and build your own levels to share with friends or challenge yourself with new gameplay experiences. The possibilities are endless!

And if you're looking for even more action, try out our survival mode. Face endless waves of enemy tanks that will come at you from all directions. It's a test of your survival skills, reaction time, and firepower.

With the demo version of Wee Tanks, you'll get a taste of all these exciting game modes and features. So grab your helmet, jump in your tank, and get ready to dominate the battlefield!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: X64 architecture
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable, Nvidia and AMD GPUs.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Disk Space may vary when playing the Beta build
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: X64 architecture
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable, Nvidia and AMD GPUs.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Disk Space may vary when playing the Beta build
